name: Neoplasm
description:
Neoplasm is a run and gun top down experience inspired by the game from the 90's "Zombies ate my Neighbors". Explore the simulation and team up with the inhabitants of this Cyber world to take down the virus infesting us all. To battle, you find the inhabitants, which provide their own unique attacks to aid you in this quest, called "Assists".

Inside an experimental lab under the city of New Garnatah, there lies a lab hidden from the public, made to create a cure for a developed cyber-virus. They have taken quarantined civilians and plunged them into a simulated hell to fight their own viruses. 

The world is influenced by the aesthetics of the Cypherpunk era, created into a picturesque exaggeration of its themes and looks to a comedic extreme.

Survive through the day and fight the viruses to survive! Try to save the civilians though, because if you don't, You will lose them forever, and your allies will become the corrupted enemy bosses that could spell your demise...
